sentences.sContent: But why did maize become the favoured food and the revered grain of the Americas?
sentences.sContent_eng: But why did maize become the favoured food and the revered grain of the Americas?
sentences.sCn: 但为什么唯独玉米成为所有美洲人最为青睐的食品与崇敬的谷物？

sentences.sContent: "This is my garden. I plant so many things, like peas, carrots and maize, " Solomon said.
sentences.sContent_eng: "This is my garden. I plant so many things, like peas, carrots and maize, " Solomon said.
sentences.sCn: 所罗门说，“这是我的菜园。我种了很多东西，像豌豆、胡萝卜和玉米。”

sentences.sContent: She is ambitious and saves what money she can so she can buy at least a bit of fertilizer for her maize crop.
sentences.sContent_eng: She is ambitious and saves what money she can so she can buy at least a bit of fertilizer for her maize crop.
sentences.sCn: 她雄心勃勃并将能节省的钱留起来，这样她至少可以为她种植的玉米作物买一点肥料。

remMethod.val: “麦子” → 麦子和玉米都属于农作物 → 玉米

trans.tranOther: a tall plant with large yellow seeds that grow together on a  cob (= long hard part )  , and that are cooked and eaten as a vegetable
